metadata.title: NY Times Crossword Across Lite .puz files
metadata.creator: NY Times Crossword editors
metadata.description:
Across Lite files for New York Times Crossword puzzles.

In August 2021, NYT announced that they would no longer publish Across Lite files for their crosswords and will remove Across Lite access for archived puzzles. This is an archive of the Across Lite files for their puzzles from 1993 to August 2021.

This is subscriber-only content, so please refrain from accessing it if you aren't, and have never been, a NYT Games subscriber.
metadata.subject: nytimes; crossword; puzzle
